name: Scoot Plastron in: Attack of the A.I.-Vians
name_original: Scoot Plastron in: Attack of the A.I.-Vians
description:
This game is a combination of brick breaker and shooter. Battle against three different types of A.I.-Vians, using only Scoot's shell as your weapon. The PG-1s will fire on you, but the projectiles can be deflected back at them with the press of a button. Can you beat all three levels?

Tutorials designed for the Dualshock 4.

Z = Shell Spin

Space = Jump

WASD/ Arrow Keys = Move
